question: My husband is 67 years old. He was wondering if problems with blood circulation has anything to do with the sudden dryness or wrinkling of his skin on his arms and hands. He was feeling weak lately and we suspect that he may also have diabetes because he's been feeling weak after eating few pieces of cookie dough. He's been taking maintenance medication for hypertension and blood circulation.Thank you in advance for your response.
title: wrinkly hands
